text: Nikky is a nickname. Notable subjects known by this nickname include the following: ==Nickname== *Nikky Finney (born Lynn Carol Finney, 1957), American poet *Nicola Jane Smedley, known as Nikky Smedley (born 1970) is an English entertainer ==Fictional character== *Nikky Ferris, lead character played by Hayley Mills in the 1964 Walt Disney Productions film The Moon-Spinners ==See also== *Nicky *Nikki (given name) *Nikko (name) *Niky
title: Nikky
